about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, B.R.Goyal Infrastructure Limited is engaged in the business of construction of infrastructure projects such as roads, highways, bridges and buildings.

The company has established an integrated EPC and construction business, supported by a design and engineering team and RMC unit. The RMC unit, located in Indore, has an installed capacity of 1.80 Lakh cubic meters per annum. As of September 30, 2024, the company operates with over 199 construction equipment and vehicles.

The company entered the wind energy business by installing a 1.25 MW wind power turbine in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, commissioned in 2005.

The company has successfully executed projects across Madhya Pradesh and is currently executing road construction projects in Maharashtra, Gujarat, Mizoram, Manipur, and Uttar Pradesh after expanding operations.

Business is divided into 5 categories:

  • Engineering Procurement Construction (EPC) services: Roads and Highways,Building and other Civil Construction
  • Ready Mix Concrete (RMC) manufacturing: Ready Mixed Concrete (RMC) is produced using computer-controlled operations, ensuring minimal environmental impact in sensitive areas.
  • Wind power generation: The company owns a 1.25 MW windmill in Jaisalmer, generating revenue and units as follows: July 2024 (13.35 INR, 3.97 Lakh KWh), March 2024 (49.38 INR, 14.70 Lakh KWh), March 2023 (33.57 INR, 10.64 Lakh KWh), March 2022 (45.49 INR, 13.85 Lakh KWh).
  • Toll Collection Contract (TCC): TCC projects are spread across Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Gujarat, Punjab, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Mizoram and Manipur.
  • Residential Plotting Projects: The company recently launched 2 residential plotting projects named as BRG Hill View - II and BRG Hill View II Extension at Village Sanawadiya, Indore.

As on September 30, 2024, the company had 402 permanent employees and 212 employees at our TCCs.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Established roads and highways sector focused construction developer
  • Efficient business model
  • Strong Order Book with growing project portfolio.
  • Technology enabled project management capabilities
  • Project management
  • Equipment ownership
  • Strong Workforce
  • Experienced management team

contactDetails.full_address: B.R.Goyal Infrastructure Limited, 3-A, Agrawal Nagar, Indore 452001

faqs.question: What is the B.R.Goyal IPO?
faqs.answer:
B.R.Goyal IPO is a SME IPO of 6312000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹85.21 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹135 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on January 7, 2025, and closes on January 9, 2025.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in B.R.Goyal IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in B.R.Goyal IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in B.R.Goyal IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in B.R.Goyal IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'B.R.Goyal IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When B.R.Goyal IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The B.R.Goyal IPO opens on January 7, 2025 and closes on January 9, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of B.R.Goyal IPO?
faqs.answer: B.R.Goyal IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for B.R.Goyal IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in B.R.Goyal IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is B.R.Goyal IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for B.R.Goyal IPO will be done on Friday, January 10, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, January 13, 2025. Check the B.R.Goyal IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is B.R.Goyal IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The B.R.Goyal IPO listing date is on Tuesday, January 14, 2025.

reservation.summary: B.R.Goyal IPO offers 6312000 shares. 1192000 (18.88%) to QIB 894000 (14.16%) to NII 2086000 (33.05%) to RII 38000 (0.6%) to employees and 1786000 (28.3%) to Anchor investors.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The B.R.Goyal IPO is subscribed 118.08 times on January 9 2025 6:54:07 PM (Day 3). The public issue subscribed 88.27 times in the retail category 69.88 times in the QIB category and 256.9 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
